name: The Blood Mage
description:
You are a blood mage. Your mana is your own life essence.

Everytime you cast a spell it will hurt you.

Search the dungeon for the powerful blood crystal.

Created as part of the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023

Key Features

  • Fast-Paced Turn-Based Combat
  • Handcrafted Areas
  • Easy to learn but hard to master
  • Localized in German and English
